title: 23 Years After 9/11 Attacks: US War On Terror And How It Changed The World
content: From the moment the first flight took off to the crash of Flight 93, in just two hours, the US was shaken to its core. The attack orchestrated by Osama Bin- laden's Al Qaeda killed 3,000 people.
summary: From the moment the first flight took off to the crash of Flight 93, in just two hours, the US was shaken to its core. The attack orchestrated by Osama Bin- laden's Al Qaeda killed 3,000 people.

title: Kamala Harris Beats Donald Trump 63%-37%, Post-Debate Survey Suggests
content: American voters broadly agree that Vice President Kamala Harris outperformed Donald Trump during Tuesday's presidential debate, according to a CNN poll of debate watchers conducted by SSRS, an independent research firm.
summary: American voters broadly agree that Vice President Kamala Harris outperformed Donald Trump during Tuesday's presidential debate, according to a CNN poll of debate watchers conducted by SSRS, an independent research firm.

title: "She'll Pay For It": Trump After Taylor Swift Endorses Harris For President
content: Taylor Swift, a self-declared "childless cat lady" and one of the world's most popular and influential stars, has endorsed Kamala Harris for president of the United States.

title: How A Bag Of Cheetos Unleashed Chaos In A Fragile US Cave Ecosystem

title: China Man Gets 23 Teeth Extracted In One Day, Dies Of Heart Attack

title: Japan Penguin Found Safe 2 Weeks After Escape, Keeper Calls It "A Miracle"
content: A fugitive penguin in Japan has been found safe and sound two weeks after escaping into the sea and paddling for miles, in what her keeper called a "miracle".

title: Opinion: India-Pak Peace Is Possible - Only If Pak Army Takes A Back Seat

title: Palestine Takes Seat Among UN Member States At 79th General Assembly Session
content: The 79th session of the UN General Assembly kicked off in New York with the presence of the representatives of Palestine, who have been given a seat in the General Assembly Hall next to the UN member states.

title: Pakistan Jolted By 5.7 Magnitude Earthquake, Tremors Felt In India
content: A 5.7 magnitude earthquake jolted parts of Pakistan, including the capital Islamabad, on Wednesday, according to the country's meteorological department.

title: Iran President Visits Iraq On First Foreign Trip Amid Political Turmoil
content: Iran's new president, Masoud Pezeshkian, began a visit to Iraq on Wednesday, aiming to deepen already close ties with the neighbouring country on his first trip abroad since taking office.

title: Japan Might Have Driverless Bullet Trains By Mid-2030s
content: Shinkansen bullet trains could be whizzing around Japan without drivers from the mid-2030s, one of its main rail operators said, motivated in part by the country's demographic crisis.

title: Iran Threatens Action Against Western Sanctions Over Arms Supply To Russia
